Question: Singapore Pavilion - ASME CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Singapore Pavilion - ASME CES 2024

Gyrogear Glove

- Equipped with a gyroscope to counter the movement of the wearer’s wrist, reducing trembling due to Parkinson’s disease
- Assists in improving hand stability and legible writing for individuals with tremors

Silent Cicada Watch

- Cools the surface of the wrist and the blood flowing through it to provide a chilly sensation
- Aims to beat the heat and offers an alternative to traditional cooling devices

Tack GPS Tracker

- Pinpoints location on a map and elevation to help locate lost items in high-rise buildings
- Requires a SIM card and can track its location across more than 120 countries

Participating Companies

- 13 companies based in Singapore showcasing innovation at CES 2024
- Range from consumer and lifestyle product makers to those in digital health and wellness tech
Summary_cn:
新加坡展馆-ASME CES 2024

回转齿轮手套

- 配备陀螺仪以抵消佩戴者手腕的运动，减少帕金森病引起的震颤
- 帮助改善手部稳定性和易读的书写能力，适用于震颤患者

静默蝉表

- 通过冷却手腕表面和流经其中的血液来提供凉爽感觉
- 旨在抵御炎热，并提供传统冷却装置的替代方案

图钉GPS追踪器

- 通过地图和高度定位帮助寻找高层建筑中丢失的物品
- 需要SIM卡，并可以在120多个国家跟踪其位置

参展公司

- 13家总部位于新加坡的公司在CES 2024展示创新产品
- 范围涵盖消费品和生活方式产品制造商以及数字健康和健康技术公司
